title: Speaker NA felicitates Arshad on outstanding performance at AAC
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has extended his heartfelt congratulations to Pakistan’s celebrated athlete, Arshad Nadeem on his exceptional performance at the Asian Athletics Championship (AAC).
In his felicitation message on Saturday, the Speaker lauded Arshad Nadeem’s remarkable achievement, saying that his dedication, perseverance and unwavering commitment have once again brought pride and honor to the nation.
“Arshad Nadeem’s stellar performance has uplifted the spirit of the entire country. His hard work and consistent excellence are truly commendable,” said the Speaker.
He said that Arshad Nadeem stands as a beacon of inspiration for the youth of Pakistan and is a true embodiment of national pride.
“By securing this significant victory on the international stage in South Korea, Arshad Nadeem has not only earned a distinguished place in the realm of athletics but has also captured the admiration and affection of the people of Pakistan,” he added.
The Speaker expressed his best wishes for Arshad Nadeem’s continued success and expressed hope that he would persist in bringing further accolades to Pakistan through his relentless determination and sportsmanship.
